content:
Hi, it looks like the CI failed again (intermittent failure) making it not possible to install RA. https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10961

Could someone please re-run the job to get the release pushed https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/runs/4490063038
Is there a reason why we do the push to trigger-nightlybranch dance for this instead of having a workflow_dispatch trigger?

Since that branch is up to date now force pushing won't trigger it, so I need to force push a different rev first, cancel that, and push the correct rev in this case. A manual workflow_dispatch would be a lot simpler
Can you trigger those manually? :+1: from me, then
By the way, there's an option to re-run a workflow in the menu, you don't always need to push to trigger-nightly.

Laurențiu 말함:

By the way, there's an option to re-run a workflow in the menu, you don't always need to push to trigger-nightly.

huh where? I tried finding a re-run option but couldn't
Oh now I see, there is a button if you go into the details view of a workflow :face_palm:
Yeah, I didn't know about it either until recently
